descr: "Indicates that a medication product is to be or has been dispensed for a named person/patient.  This includes a description of the medication product (supply) provided and the instructions for administering the medication.  The medication dispense is the result of a pharmacy system responding to a medication order."

fields.name: wasSubstituted
fields.descr: "True if the dispenser dispensed a different drug or product from what was prescribed."

fields.name: type
fields.descr: "A code signifying whether a different drug was dispensed from what was prescribed."

fields.name: reason
fields.descr: "Indicates the reason for the substitution of (or lack of substitution) from what was prescribed."

fields.name: responsibleParty
fields.descr: "The person or organization that has primary responsibility for the substitution."
